name: Taco Truck
description: Serving authentic Mexican street tacos with fresh ingredients and bold flavors.

name: Burger Bus
description: A retro-styled food truck offering juicy burgers, crispy fries, and milkshakes.

name: Gourmet Grills
description: Premium grilled dishes and BBQ platters crafted by expert chefs.

name: Pizza Wagon
description: A wood-fired pizza truck serving hand-tossed pies with gourmet toppings.

name: Sandwich Stop
description: Crafting hearty sandwiches with freshly baked bread and quality ingredients.

name: BBQ Express
description: Smoked meats, tangy sauces, and classic BBQ sides served hot and fast.

name: Seafood Shack
description: Fresh seafood delights, from shrimp tacos to grilled fish, sourced locally.

name: Hot Dog Haven
description: Classic hot dogs, gourmet sausages, and creative toppings for every taste.

name: Vegan Delights
description: Innovative plant-based dishes that are as tasty as they are healthy.

name: Dessert Truck
description: Decadent desserts, from gourmet cupcakes to indulgent ice cream sundaes.

name: Coffee Cruiser
description: Mobile coffee bar offering artisanal espresso and cold brew.

name: Waffle Wagon
description: Sweet and savory waffles made fresh on the spot.

name: Steakhouse on Wheels
description: High-quality steak dinners served food-truck style.

name: Korean BBQ Truck
description: Korean BBQ bowls and street food favorites.

name: Ice Cream Express
description: Serving ice-cold treats, including sundaes and shaved ice.

name: Mediterranean Eats
description: Delicious Mediterranean wraps, hummus bowls, and more.

name: Thai Street Food
description: Authentic Thai dishes like pad thai and green curry.

name: Soul Food Truck
description: Comfort food classics like fried chicken and mac 'n cheese.

name: Fusion Bistro
description: Unique fusion dishes blending global flavors.

name: Breakfast Truck
description: All-day breakfast favorites served fresh and hot.
